actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide for certain adjustment payments to compensate for amounts required to repaid by units of local governments by reason of administrative error.

summary.text: Provides, under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972, for adjustment payments to compensate for amounts required to be repaid by units of local governments by reason of administrative error.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide for certain adjustment payments to compensate for amounts required to repaid by units of local governments by reason of administrative error.
